weloveclouds.commons.networking

Class AbstractServer<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • weloveclouds.commons.networking.AbstractServer<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientRequestInterceptorService, EcsNotificationService, HealthMonitoringService, NotificationService, Server

    public abstract class AbstractServer<M>
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents an abstract server which can accept connections on the referred port.
